comment: Attributes that identify the trunk of the vehicle's body

contents.name: IsOpenCommand
contents.description: Trunk open or closed. True = Open. False = Closed

contents.name: IsLockedCommand
contents.description: Is trunk locked or unlocked. True = Locked. False = Unlocked

contents.name: IsOpenTelemetry
contents.description: Trunk open or closed. True = Open. False = Closed

contents.name: IsLockedTelemetry
contents.description: Is trunk locked or unlocked. True = Locked. False = Unlocked
